name: Hexa Puzzle - classic
description:
It is simple and addictive! Once you start, you will not stop playing. Give it a try, you will love it!

How to play?
* Try to pick suitable hexa block.
* Try to place picked hexa block on the board.
* No rotate of blocks on hexa frame.
* Match block hexa puzzle free to clear level.
* Don`t worry: No time limits.
* Hints are available.

Why choose us?
* Exquisite game interface!
* Easy to play, a classic puzzle game for all ages!
* This is free, no Wifi required!
